org.ranksys.formats.rec

Class SimpleRecommendationFormat<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ranksys.formats.rec.TuplesRecommendationFormat<U,I>
      • org.ranksys.formats.rec.SimpleRecommendationFormat<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecommendationFormat<U,I>

    public class SimpleRecommendationFormat<U,I>
extends TuplesRecommendationFormat<U,I>
    Simple format for recommendations: tab-separated user-item-score triplets, grouping first by user (not necessarily in order) and then by decreasing order of score.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
